name: Holi-invasion
description:
A game made in two weeks for the 32bit Holiday Jam of 2021!

Special thanks to Captain4LK, our programmer, for creating the engine that was used :)

Audio & Music by AdamAudio! 

Main character & Misc. Art by Ryan!

Weapon & alien sprites by Me!

Other art & audio: OpenGameArt.org

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Interact (secret doors only)

1 - Bat
2 - Pistol
3 - Shotgun
4- Rocket Launcher

IF WEB BUILD INPUT NOT WORKING tab out and back in
